content:
After midnight, the enemy attacked the Nikopol district of Dnipropetrovsk region.

About thisreportedHead of Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak.

“The aggressor hit the Chervonohrigor community. Applied heavy artillery. People are intact, ”Sergey Lisak said.

According to him, in the morning the invaders continued the attacks, sent two drones-Kamikadze to Nikopol.

Previously, there are no victims of the dead and victims.

The rest of the territory of Dnipropetrovsk region passed without shelling.
title: The invaders in the morning attacked Nikopol Droam-Kamikadze
description: This was reported by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak. “The aggressor hit on ...
author: Army Inform
